mapper.select: select * from v_tssdtask t1 where tssdtaskid=#{id}
select * from v_tssdtask t1 where tssdtaskid=#{id}
select * from v_tssdtask t1 where tssdtaskid=#{id}
select * from v_tssdtask t1 where tssdtaskid=#{id}
select * from v_tssdtask t1 where tssdtaskid=#{id}
select * from v_tssdtask t1 where tssdtaskid=#{id}
mapper.sql: SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ENABLEFLAG, t1.TSSDENGINEID, t11.TSSDENGINENAME, t1.TSSDTASKID, t1.TSSDTASKNAME, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.USERDATA, t1.USERDATA2, t1.USERDATA3, t1.USERDATA4, t1.VERSION FROM T_SRFTSSDTASK t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFTSSDENGINE t11 ON t1.TSSDENGINEID = t11.TSSDENGINEID

SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`ENABLEFLAG`, t1.`TSSDENGINEID`, t11.`TSSDENGINENAME`, t1.`TSSDTASKID`, t1.`TSSDTASKNAME`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`USERDATA`, t1.`USERDATA2`, t1.`USERDATA3`, t1.`USERDATA4`, t1.`VERSION` FROM `T_SRFTSSDTASK` t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFTSSDENGINE t11 ON t1.TSSDENGINEID = t11.TSSDENGINEID

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ENABLEFLAG, t1.TSSDENGINEID, t11.TSSDENGINENAME, t1.TSSDTASKID, t1.TSSDTASKNAME, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.USERDATA, t1.USERDATA2, t1.USERDATA3, t1.USERDATA4, t1.VERSION FROM T_SRFTSSDTASK t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFTSSDENGINE t11 ON t1.TSSDENGINEID = t11.TSSDENGINEID

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.ENABLEFLAG AS ENABLEFLAG, t1.TSSDENGINEID AS TSSDENGINEID, t11.TSSDENGINENAME AS TSSDENGINENAME, t1.TSSDTASKID AS TSSDTASKID, t1.TSSDTASKNAME AS TSSDTASKNAME, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN, t1.USERDATA AS USERDATA, t1.USERDATA2 AS USERDATA2, t1.USERDATA3 AS USERDATA3, t1.USERDATA4 AS USERDATA4, t1.VERSION AS VERSION FROM T_SRFTSSDTASK t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFTSSDENGINE t11 ON t1.TSSDENGINEID = t11.TSSDENGINEID

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.ENABLEFLAG AS ENABLEFLAG, t1.TSSDENGINEID AS TSSDENGINEID, t11.TSSDENGINENAME AS TSSDENGINENAME, t1.TSSDTASKID AS TSSDTASKID, t1.TSSDTASKNAME AS TSSDTASKNAME, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN, t1.USERDATA AS USERDATA, t1.USERDATA2 AS USERDATA2, t1.USERDATA3 AS USERDATA3, t1.USERDATA4 AS USERDATA4, t1.VERSION AS VERSION FROM T_SRFTSSDTASK t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFTSSDENGINE t11 ON t1.TSSDENGINEID = t11.TSSDENGINEID

SELECT t1.[CREATEDATE], t1.[CREATEMAN], t1.[ENABLEFLAG], t1.[TSSDENGINEID], t11.[TSSDENGINENAME], t1.[TSSDTASKID], t1.[TSSDTASKNAME], t1.[UPDATEDATE], t1.[UPDATEMAN], t1.[USERDATA], t1.[USERDATA2], t1.[USERDATA3], t1.[USERDATA4], t1.[VERSION] FROM [T_SRFTSSDTASK] t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFTSSDENGINE t11 ON t1.TSSDENGINEID = t11.TSSDENGINEID
